2. Description of Service

Potodoro is a focus timer application that gamifies productivity through virtual plant growing. The app includes:

  • Focus timer with customizable durations (5-120 minutes)
  • Stopwatch mode for open-ended focus sessions
  • Virtual plant growing with multiple strains to unlock
  • Progress tracking with levels, XP, and achievements
  • Session organization with customizable tags
  • Daily streak tracking
  • Live Activities for Lock Screen and Dynamic Island
  • Home screen widgets
  • Optional premium features (Potodoro Pro)

5. In-App Purchases

Potodoro offers optional in-app purchases:

Potodoro Pro (Subscription or Lifetime):

  • Monthly subscription with 7-day free trial

Pro features include: detailed insights and statistics, unlimited custom tags, free strain unlocks, and all future premium features.

Consumable Purchases:

  • Coins: Virtual currency for unlocking strains (500, 1500, or 5000 coin packs)

All purchases are processed through Apple's App Store and are subject to Apple's terms and conditions.
